mapper.sql: id, username, manage_type, manage_table, manage_date, service_name, method_name
mapper.insert: insert into manage_record (id, username, manage_type, manage_table, manage_date, service_name, method_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update manage_record
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_type = #{manageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_table = #{manageTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_date = #{manageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update manage_record set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_type = #{manageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_table = #{manageTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_date = #{manageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into manage_record (id, username, manage_type, manage_table, manage_date, service_name, method_name) values
( #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.manageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.manageTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.manageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: delete from manage_record where manage_date <= #{manageDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
